response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us and is estimated to be worth $1,000,000 to you based on its unique features and benefits. Considering its high quality and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. Should you decide to accept this offer, we promise a seamless process with exceptional customer service. If you need more information or have any concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
